text: 21.38: FG 5.36-37Ai, gu khueŋ ndɨkndɨgi, ndu kha Idzɨp guma, ndu fhum mba ntara bakɨme khavgiap, 4,000 gumgi ndigi, mbe ntari ga mbui kozin ntari ga mbui. Ndu mbe ndigap, zomzorap, nza Romiŋ, nde nzan ntari ga mbui gɨɨtɨvi phorga shogim, nde vhɨzgi. Ndura mben kov mba gumgi ki fhuv ŋanen vugi gumara khare thi?”
